header.title: Our Team
header.subtitle: Meet the talented individuals from Lovely Professional University behind our success

members.name: Pushkar Varshney
members.bio: A dynamic Computer Science graduate from LPU, Pushkar combines technical expertise with leadership skills. With a passion for emerging technologies and innovation, he drives our team's vision and ensures project excellence.

members.name: Rajvardhan Singh
members.bio: A skilled Backend Developer and LPU alumnus, Rajvardhan specializes in building robust server-side applications. His expertise in system architecture and database optimization helps us deliver scalable and efficient solutions.

members.name: Ankit Ranjan
members.bio: An LPU graduate with a keen eye for design, Ankit excels in creating intuitive and responsive user interfaces. His expertise in modern frontend technologies and user experience design helps us build engaging digital products.

members.name: Vikas Singh
members.bio: A DevOps expert and LPU graduate, Vikas specializes in cloud infrastructure and automation. His expertise in CI/CD pipelines and cloud technologies ensures our applications are deployed efficiently and securely.
